original_text: And David spake unto the Lord the words of this song in the day that the Lord had delivered him out of the hand of all his enemies, and out of the hand of Saul:
korean_text: 여호와께서 다윗을 모든 원수의 손과 사울의 손에서 구원하신 그 날에 다윗이 이 노래의 말씀으로 여호와께 아뢰어

sentences.original_text: And David spake unto the Lord
in the day that the Lord had delivered him
out of the hand of all his enemies
and out of the hand of Saul:
